files.patch:
@@ -268,0 +268,8 @@
+  if test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_OS" = xmacosx; then
+    if test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU" = xaarch64; then
+      MACHINE_FLAG="$MACHINE_FLAG -arch arm64"
+    elif test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU" = xx86_64; then
+      MACHINE_FLAG="$MACHINE_FLAG -arch x86_64"
+    fi
+  fi
+
